divs: Sighting DetailsWalked out of hose and immediately observed an extremely bright object low on the horizon. Checked cell phone Google Sky View for natural body; Venus, but nothing registered. Noticed object began to move, so I decided to try and catch up to it in car. Gave chase for 5 mins, but object rose higher in sky and seemed give off a dull flash and vanished.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brooksville
There were no other sightings in Brooksville on or around August 14th 2013
Summary: Notice extremely bright object hovering low. Light had a tinge of red. Chased in car, but disappeared.
